relatedRecords.name: Let's Test Conference
relatedRecords.description: Let’s Test Conferences are all about context-driven testing. We meet, talk, listen and learn from each other in order to build a stronger community of testers and to improve our testing skills. With conferences happening all over the world, the Let’s Test Experience is never far away. Join us!
